website_summaries.verdict: Though the colors have been known to disappoint and it may skid on some flooring, the size of this rug makes it a practical choice for many consumers.
pros: Offers the brand's quality microfiber material that absorbs water and stands up to washing
Versatile size is practical for most bathrooms, and fits well in front of most sinks and tubs
cons: Some colors look different in person, including the tan that looks a bit orange and navy that looks dark blue

customer_reviews.title: Great entry mats for dogs, big and small.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these rugs for my covered lanai, hoping to keep the mud and sand the dogs bring in the house, out of the house. Mission accomplished. Also I love rubbing my toes in the soft plush of them. Of importance is how well they wash. These big rugs fit in the washing machine and dry quickly outside on a sunny day. I've also purchased the smaller versions for near my kitchen sink and under the pet water dish, along with spares. They have been through the washer many times and still look new! Just everything I'd hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: wine4jac

customer_reviews.title: It has a funny look like noodles
customer_reviews.text: It has a funny look like noodles, but it is a nice neutral color and is soft, absorbent, non-slip, quick to dry, and easy to launder. I have a small bathroom with poor ventilation and this mat has been working out very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!! Dogs and I love this nice mat!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these mats and my dogs love themt. My dogs still try to nest in the mats but don't pull out the threads as easily as all of my previous floor mats. So far, regular washing is not destroying the backing. I keep buying more of these! They look okay on top of rugs by doors where my dogs like to sleep and guard the premises. Highly recommend! I need more of them.
customer_reviews.author: lovedogs

customer_reviews.title: Soft, plush, great color and wonderful non slip backing.
customer_reviews.text: Great rug. I looked around for a longtime to get the right rug that wa a big enough, thick enough and soft enough and this one is great. It has a wonderful backing on it that helps it Stya put and not slip in the bathroom. It’s so soft and plush and I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: LisaMarie Atchley

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent yet quick to dry! Look great! Turquoise is vivid!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t judge everything as it is new. I did receive three yesterday and liked them enough to order more. If you’re barefoot you can feel where is the “shag” makes a little bump underfoot. Not serious. They look terrific! They are very absorbent and yet dry immediately. I also know they wash well and dry almost immediately in the dryer on low . Sort of a miracle. ...Six months later they are still great. No problems
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mary Mary

customer_reviews.title: MAYSHINE Non Slip Bathroom Rugs 39" X 24"
customer_reviews.text: These rugs are so soft to walk on, fits perfectly in front of our sinks and love the extra length that many rugs don't provide. I've only had them a week so can't speak to durability or easiness to clean, but look forward to having and enjoying them for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Review

customer_reviews.title: Foam portion starts to deterioriate after a time.
customer_reviews.text: After 1.5 years of usage and washing it every week or every other week, the foam portion of the rug (the tan colored material that is visible when viewing it from the bottom) is starting to deteriorate. The problem is that it's coming off in small bits and pieces as it tumbles around in the washer, which I fear may clog up the machine's drain pump. I'll be throwing these out soon and getting a replacement that doesn't use foam material.
customer_reviews.author: D Tran

customer_reviews.title: Quality Rugs Wash after Wash
customer_reviews.text: This is my third size of Mayshine rug. I love that these rugs are both quality in material and colorfast in the washing machine. While similar rugs have unraveled in the washer, these are still new looking, wash after wash. I use these rugs under my dogs' water dishes, as an entryway mat from the pool into our bathroom, next to the kitchen sink, and as muddy doggie footprint catchers under my covered porch. Yep, they foot the bill for catching dirt and keeping my floors cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: wine4jac

customer_reviews.title: Awesome color and feel
customer_reviews.text: Love this bath mat. It's soft and the color is lovely. It's like bright green grass and adds so much to our white bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: 5044ever

customer_reviews.title: Love this Mat!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat! My dog always comes in with wet and muddy paws, and I was constantly laying a towel down because my small and decorative door mat was not cutting it. This solved my problem! If they're soaked this won't completely dry them, but it will take off that initial dirt and wetness, but for damp paws it's perfect! I have him walk all the way down it and voila, no more bending down to dry each paw every single time! Just an FYI, It sits a little high for our door and makes it a little hard to open but it's worth keeping for that small inconvenience!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Spargifiore

customer_reviews.title: Rugs slide all over!!!
customer_reviews.text: The 3 rugs I received (one in gray and 2 in brown) are NOT non-slip. They slide all over my laminate floor and also my tile floor. Very disappointed in this product because I really like the rugs but they are very dangerous because of the backing. I don't understand some reviewers stating that they don't slip. All 3 of mine easily slide over my dry floors. Did I get defective products???
customer_reviews.author: NancyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Only used to catch cat litter
customer_reviews.text: I only use this for my cats litter box. Finally, no more litter all over the house! Personally, I would not use it for a bathroom. It is soft to the touch but slides and doesn't feel plush because the nubs aren't spaced close enough together. A bit too sparse which makes it go flat. If you have cats, this is the best thing I have found to capture most of their litter. Shake it out and you are good to go. The cats don't mind stepping on it at all. Washes well but does take forever to dry.
customer_reviews.author: artisangirl

customer_reviews.title: I read about this rug that was nice looking the right size and advertised as non slip
customer_reviews.text: I just had hip replacement surgery and needed a small bathroom rug that is non slip. I read about this rug that was nice looking the right size and advertised as non slip. I put the rug down and it slides a lot, definitely not a non slip.i bought 2 because it looked so nice. Big mistake
customer_reviews.author: joni manuel

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, substantial, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Beautiful color, very substantial, lays really nice. I'm using one on each side of my bed to add some color to the room.It is on laminate flooring, and is nonslip as advertised. Just got it. I'm curious to see how it will hold up with my dogs/dog hair and to washing. I'm pretty optimistic. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Nebraska Kid

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, as described by seller, soft and looks great!!
customer_reviews.text: This bath mat runner is awesome! I love how it covers the entire floor area in front of the tub. Doesn't slip when standing on it and super soft and comfortable for the feet. I've had this for almost 2 weeks and it is holding up well. Doesn't seem to have the "crushed" look after multiple uses of standing on it wet. (I've had other mats that look horrible after a few days of being used. These Mayshine mats seem to bounce back after drying out. LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: About as Anti-Slip as a Banana Peel
customer_reviews.text: Check out the video yourself. This mat moves around like a slab of butter, hardly any traction at all. And the rug is so thick that it gets caught on the bathroom door, the shower door and nearly anything else in its path, very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Bigmac

customer_reviews.title: NOT Non-Slip & Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are not non-slip! They have backing that looks non-slip, but if you actually need rugs that do not move around, these are not the rugs for you. It is wrong for this seller to describe them as non-slip. Some people, such as the elderly, need non-slip rugs for safety. Also, the overall quality wasn't too impressive for the price. Less expensive rugs from Target and Walmart seem higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this very plush rug, it's super plush
customer_reviews.text: We got one of these at work for the hallway, when I walked on it, it was so super comfy and soft. It is thick, plush and very well constructed. I bought it, just in another color for home. I LOVE IT. It matches my colors perfect, it is just as soft and plushy as the one at work. Definitely a great buy, just a little higher priced than I am used to , but you pay well for quality. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: JKMudGirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice for anyone with dogs
customer_reviews.text: Don't know if these were meant for a dog runner, but they are fantastic at helping to keep the floor clean. I put this in front of the back door and the dogs have to go over it before they come into the living room. it stops 90% of the mud, water & dirts
customer_reviews.author: Lab Rat

customer_reviews.title: Nice rug for the lake cabin, keeps dogs from tracking water all over the floor
customer_reviews.text: This rug is exactly what I wanted for in front of a patio door at our lake place. With wet dogs and kids coming in and out I wanted something that would keep them from tracking water all over the floor. I was happy to find this one on Amazon because we bought a smaller similar door mat at the hardware store here but it wasn’t available in the longer length I wanted for in front of the whole double width door. This one is perfect and does exactly what I wanted. I love that it’s machine washable so when it gets mucked up from the dogs and kids it can go right in the washer.
customer_reviews.author: maggiesmama

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this rug for a few days. So far I like it. I was a disappointed when I got it, because it was supposed to be light gray but it is more of a graige. It's lighter than I expected from the picture. I am disappointed that this color isn't available in the smaller rugs. I have not decided if I am keeping it yet, only because I can't get the smaller rugs to match. It's very soft and comfy to walk on. I don't know how well it will hold up. I will update my review in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Temporary
customer_reviews.text: Rug is cute but fall apart after washed once ):
customer_reviews.author: ToniMarie Mendez

customer_reviews.title: It does a great job at soaking up all the water that dribbles ...
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job at soaking up all the water that dribbles out from the side of the shower door. It dries quickly when we hang it up. It also feels nice on your feet when you step out of the shower. It looks nice and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: TJR

customer_reviews.title: Faded blue
customer_reviews.text: Dark blue rug: Its okay and I like that it is cushiony but you can definitely find something of better quality for the same price....i probs would have only paid max $10 for the 20×32(@14.99) **Ps:color is NOT dark/navy blue its nore like a medium slighlty faded blue(see pic compared to my navy shirt)
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, beautiful, and it really works!
customer_reviews.text: This delightfully absorbent rug has removed all sorts of frustration from my mind. I no longer need to throw down a clean towel to catch the water that inevitably slips through BOTH sides of the shower curtain. What a waste of clean laundry! No more. It has also brought peace of mind when my young children go up to shower themselves. No more swamplands to dry!!! I bought the longest one and could not be happier with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Scholar Mama

customer_reviews.title: Really love these rugs.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rugs. I bought the turquoise and my bathroom is really bright now. I have washed the rugs and they came out great. There was some lint but no more then most rugs.
customer_reviews.author: linamalie

customer_reviews.title: Backing separated from the rug when laundered
customer_reviews.text: I had two of these rugs. One is the 47x27.5 size and is dark gray color. I have no problem with the dark gray rug. However the second one was 31x59 size and was beige color. The actual color of the rug was more gold than beige, but I was willing to keep it since I liked the rug. However, when the beige rug was laundered according to the instructions on the label, the backing separated from the rug during the wash cycle. This caused a ridge down the middle of the rug where the rug would no longer lay flat. Returning the rug was no problem, so I'm satisfied but can't recommend the beige color in the 31x59 size.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm2

customer_reviews.title: Working great as a back door rug for the dog's wet ...
customer_reviews.text: Working great as a back door rug for the dog's wet feet. I realize this is a bath mat, but the brown color blends in with the wood-look tile enough that it does not bother me, and does a good job of drying her paws as she trots over it. It shakes out well. I have washed it once and it held up fine but I will try to wash it as little as possible, with just a shake out. Costs less than the exact same thing sold as a "dog rug". I would buy again, and probably will.
customer_reviews.author: Cellomommy

customer_reviews.title: Shrunk an inch after washing
customer_reviews.text: I thought I found a near perfect mat for our bathroom (47 inches vs 48 inch floor space). It’s not so much now. It was shrunk at least an inch after washing leaving a 2 inch gap instead of 1 inch like when it first arrived.
customer_reviews.author: CaliforniaGuy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is the fifth mat I have tried. It is a dark grey, as pictured. It does not slip and slide, an important issue for safety in our household. It absorbs the water and feels dry immediately. It doesn't mash down and look sloppy where wet feet stood on it. It is soft, absorbent and attractive. At last the search is over.
customer_reviews.author: Wildbird

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, absorbent, and great looking
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this rug. We researched several to find one that was absorbent, soft, and nice looking and this blew our expectations out of the water. So soft, thick and absorbent!!!! Looks fabulous in our bathroom and washes well. My husband said the other day that this was the best rug and he never notices things like that. Will be ordering for all our bathrooms :)
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product since February 28,2019. It is soft and absorbent. I have yet to wash it. I usually shake it out once a week as it’s not in a high traffic area. I discovered today that the chenille looping is coming out. There is a 3 by 4 inch bare spot Don’t dare wash it now. The stitching in the rug binding is coming out. Very disappointed in quality considering price. Basically when the rug needs laundered it’s in the trash can. And I purchased two...grrr.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe I'm reviewing a bathmat
customer_reviews.text: I wish this bathmat came in custom colors, because I'd order one for every room. What makes this mat so awesome? It doesn't crush or get matted, it magically never feels wet and it stays put. It is so plush that my door barely closes over the top of it, but I'll deal because I'm keeping this rug. I haven't washed it yet, so can't speak to the longevity. But on the bright side...it doesn't show any dirt!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the quality of this product. Ordered three carpets and all three are stained on the back and not heavy enough to lay flat. Had company arriving so had no choice but to use them or I would have returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Movie watcher

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Crap
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed and would give 0 stars if possible. I bought this product because it was supposed to be well-made. Luckily I own a great vacuum that can get all the seemingly millions of tiny rubber balls from the disintegrated backing out of my washer and dryer after its 3rd cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: Not soft! And not plush!
customer_reviews.text: So, first, I ordered this bc it was green for a child’s bathroom decor. It is green. So that’s it’s one and only plus. It is, though, not a soft and plush as the photos make it look. And, it’s going to be horrid to clean since I used to vacuum my other bathroom rugs (this one you cannot vacuum to get hair out). And then, bc it’s for a kids bathroom, I thought it would be soft to kneel on during bath time. NOPE! That’s a big fat nope! It is sooooo painful to kneel on I’ll be ordering knee pads for bath time. :-(
customer_reviews.author: 1review

customer_reviews.title: “White” can be white sometimes & ivory other times
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 white May shine rugs from the same seller for my bathroom. One arrived in white, the other in cream/ivory. Keep in mind that ivory wasn’t an option, only white was, so you would think that both “whites” would be the same, but no...not so much! Very disappointed since these rugs sit right next to each other and are quite visibly different shades.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Nice rug for my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I got this one for my bathroom to match the style of other rugs of same desogn. And I kust say that the quality of this one was far far much better than my previoua rugs. Seems absorbent but haven't poured out the water too much to test it... also I bought the coffeee color so it wont appear dirty too soon.
customer_reviews.author: heer

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs nicely and feels great under my feet
customer_reviews.text: Absorbs nicely and feels great under my feet. Very plush does have a little gaping but it's soooooo thick. Very pleased with this purchase :) I highly recommend and would buy again. * I washed this before use and did experience some white foam ball residue after I would take it down from over the shower door (I hang it up before & after use), but after a week or two the little foam balls stopped falling out*
customer_reviews.author: N.W

customer_reviews.title: Best bathroom mats I have found! Dogs love them too!!
customer_reviews.text: Great bathroom rug. Washes just fine and backing does not break off (so far). Dogs love to lie on them and there appears to be no adverse effects for the dogs. (Some bathmats have caused skin problems for some dogs.) I have replaced ALL of my bathroom mags with Mayshine and am very pleased with them. I also use the larger mats by doors where my dogs like to nap. Good pricing. Different sizes usually available for purchase. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lovedogs

customer_reviews.title: The charcoal is actually navy, the plastic backing leaves residue on floor
customer_reviews.text: The charcoal gray color is ABSOLUTELY NAVY BLUE. Every single person who looks at these mats confirms they are navy, so I know it's not just me. I double checked that I ordered the correct color. ALSO, the plastic backing sticks to my concrete floors and now there is a textured, web-like pattern, left from the residue from the mat's backing. I literally have to scrape it off my floor.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Mama

customer_reviews.title: Good rug for the money
customer_reviews.text: Material: This is made 100% polyester. It has a shag like appearance and is very soft. Absorbancy: It soaks up water good and does stay damp for very long. Although the Absorbancy is good I wouldn't recommend this for a rug when your fresh out of the shower. This mat works great for by the sink instead. Comfort: Its soft!! I really like how comfortable it is for bare feet. Kinda squishy. Color: I ordered RED. It is a darkish bright red. Not a vibrant color which I prefer but you may not. Shipping: Took awhile to ship but after arrived on time and it good condition. Overall great comfortable rug at a good price. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: ... one of these for my newly remodeled bathroom and liked it so much
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my newly remodeled bathroom and liked it so much, I ordered a second--both white. But when the second one came, it was a decidedly different color--cream--even though cream is not an option. I have two rugs in my long narrow bathroom now that don't match as I wanted them to. They're great bath mats/rugs, but if you think you're going to want more than one, maybe order them at the same time. The difference is really jarring in my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Mamazabakaka

customer_reviews.title: Great bathroom rugs, comfortable underfoot, dry quickly
customer_reviews.text: These shaggy rugs remind me of the thing my father used to wash our cars with. There’s nothing wrong with their appearance, but its not my idea of a high end look. That said, they are so much better than more expensive department store “designer” rugs that got soaked, matted, discolored and were so thin you might as well have been barefoot on the tile. These are soft and comfortable underfoot, you can drip all over them and they still somehow feel dry. They dry quickly after your shower and don’t get discolored. I machine wash them and lay them flat to dry. After a test period with the first set, I bought two more. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sonic mom

customer_reviews.title: Good but not so good.
customer_reviews.text: Over the past 18 months we have been replacing our old rugs with the Mayshine chenille rugs in various sizes. Overall, I love the rugs and have had no issue except for the 27.5X 47 in dark gray. Do to their location, I have only had to wash these maybe 3 times. I noticed after the 2nd was that the backing seemed to have loosened from the chenille topper. The 3rd wash did them in. They no longer lay right and are puckered throughout. I did nothing different when I washed these than my other Mayshine rugs...even the 31X59 in brown washed beautifully with no issues. Unfortunately, I didn't have this issue until after the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to wash I just pop it in the washer and I even use the drier to dry it. Doesn’t show any signs of distress or wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Looks fine, but strong chemical smell after many washes
customer_reviews.text: I like that this came in a big size to cover a significant area of our kids bathroom. It is also soft underfoot and bends easily to fit into our front loading washer and dryer easily. However, after many washes, it still has a very chemically smell from the rubber backing that's pretty off-putting. It works for our needs now, but I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Smommy

customer_reviews.title: Backing falls apart
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rug for our bathroom. The rug was very comfortable and stayed in place, until I washed it the first time. I followed all the directions, delicate cycle, to a tee. When I removed it from my front loading washing machine, the backing was in tiny pieces all over the inside of my washer and the rug. Giant mess. Defective product. Gave it 3 stars because it WAS comfortable, and DID stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Cactus Queen

customer_reviews.title: backing issue
customer_reviews.text: While I love these rugs, (ordered two large ones) the backing does not last more than 6 months. The backs started coming unglued - separated from the rug after the first wash and have never been the same. I washed them on a regular cycle and placed them outside to dry in the shade. If not for this I would have given the product 5 stars. I have tried to make them last as long as I can . For 37.99 each they should have lasted a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: Malefica

customer_reviews.title: MUDDY PAWS BEST FRIEND
customer_reviews.text: This product is a real life saver! I have two large dogs and a lot of rainy (think - MUD!) days where we live. The rugs work like a huge blotter. I started with just two rugs at each entry door. They worked great but I still had to wipe those paws. I got a few more rugs and created a path. By the time the dogs run on it, their paws are completely clean! The rugs are very easy to clean - just stick them in the wash. They come out very clean, basically new looking. When it’s dry, no mud, or when we have guests coming, I just store them away. Absolutely love them. Can’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: PortBelGus

customer_reviews.title: ACTUALLY machine washable, not just claiming to be
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing low quality bathmats which claimed to be machine washable (but weren't, evidenced by the PVC bottom disintegrating immediately after one wash, despite following washing instructions), I decided to give this a shot and I am in love with this bathmat! I've washed at least twice and no issues. I may even purchase more to use as a temporary solution to a lack of area rugs. Definitely worth it- these will last!
customer_reviews.author: HighMaintenanceHippi3

customer_reviews.title: Rubber backing FAIL :(
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Washed them in cold water and hung them out to dry ... about 1/2 of the rubber backing came off updated review. Just got it but it seems exactly as described. Long enough to cover the entrance to my shower very nicely and very comfy and water absorbent when I step out. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Asecretary

customer_reviews.title: truly absorbant.
customer_reviews.text: I love these rugs. I put them on my bedroom floor because I have a piddler pup. In fact he might even do a total pee job. I needed something that was totally absorbant. I kept checking the underneath of the mat and nothing, no wetness. The chenille must totally absorb all the wetness. I washed them of course after 2 weeks and they came out perfect...I am really really thrilled with these mats. Their advertizing is totally honest. They look great too....and they are soft..Puppies love them.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Williams

customer_reviews.title: Decent Rugs at a Decent Price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an entire set of these Mayshine bath rugs through lightning deals, and I'm pretty happy with them. They do what they're supposed to do, so I don't need to go into detail on how a bath mat works. Also, they have survived a few washes in the washing machine just fine, no issues there. I wouldn't attempt to put them in a dryer though. If there's any downside to these rugs it's that sometimes my cats think the rugs are dirt, since they're brown, and then deposit new reasons for me to wash the rugs again.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Plush and do NOT budge!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bath math before that looked like these but did not stay in place, always shifting around and never staying in place ... but this thing does not budge! We bought two different sizes and I tried to make them move by scuffing my feet on them, twisting my feet, etc... and they didn’t budge at all! Perfect! Very plush and soft. Feels great on the feet and all the different size options meant I found the perfect sizes we needed. Color true to pic. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J. Collier

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bath Rug
customer_reviews.text: Nice and cushy under the feet. The pile or tuffs that form the surface are larger than what I had expected or seen in the past but I am very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tom R.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Love this rug... soft, absorbent and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a patio door in our basement where lots of wet feet and muddy feet come in through the door. The color is wonderful and its incredibly soft. It washes in the washing machine perfectly. I didn't dry it in the dryer but I'm sure it would have been fine. I just hung it up to dry and it looked as great as the day it arrived. I'm very happy with this rug and if I need another one for bathrooms or any area that has wet traffic, I would definitely order again. Update: months later still great and have purchased a couple more
customer_reviews.author: TinaD

customer_reviews.title: GreAt Dog Door Mat
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a dog door mat for my 105lb Bernese. It is like magic. Replaces several towels. Looks better, absorbs water and mud way better than a towel. Highly recommend as a dog door mat
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Wigglebottoms

customer_reviews.title: This rug is great -
customer_reviews.text: These are great rugs. The first I got for the bathroom in the perfect blue. The second one was a larger size which I got for the hall. Dogs love to sleep on it. Soft and cool for them. All you have to do is shake them out. Dog hair (Golden Retriever) doesn't stick to them and they are very attractive. So glad that I found them! Ordering another one tonight in another color. The color selection is terrific. Dogs love these rugs! So does the dog's mom...
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Secure and absorbent but also pretty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the intention to match my hand towels that I bought at the store. The color is just slightly lighter but is close enough. These are super soft but still absorbent. I like the thick backing on it as I feel secure in not slipping after getting out of the tub. I bought this one for in from of my washer and dryer which are also in my bathroom. Its almost the same size as the previous rug i had there. The picture shows the mats lighter but they are not grey.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Fully and Safe !  Great on slick bathroom floors.
customer_reviews.text: I have been on the search for a good non-slip bathroom mat for years. So frustrated that so many mats did not work. True, we have a super slick tile bathroom floor... but how hard is it to make a non-slip bathmat ? Not asking to send it to the moon or anything, just want it to stay put when wet. Argh ! Well these mats finally did it. Woo Hoo !! Please advise if there is a noble prize for the engineer who designed these mats ... will vote YES! !
customer_reviews.author: Kekolalada

customer_reviews.title: Feels Great Under Feet
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of this area rug I have purchased. Thick, nice under the feet. Not sure on absorbency as it is not used in the bathroom. I do not vacuum it, I think the long tarns of the pile would immediately get caught up in the vacuum thus ruining he rug, but I throw it in the dryer on air for a few minutes and that dislodges any debris and leaves the rug looking fresh and fluffy. Washes fine on gentle setting, medium spin.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Much Better than Expected
customer_reviews.text: If you are thinking about buying this one, go ahead & BUY it, it's a wonderful mat! A very HAPPY surprise at how perfect this mat was for my hall/guest bath. It was intended for front entry or bathroom. It matched so perfectly in the bathroom in color, size & soft cushiony feel it was just meant to be! I am thrilled with this mat! The gray color will match a multitude of different grays & also used as a great neutral too! I haven't washed it yet but from looking at the quality I think it will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: *elleG

customer_reviews.title: A nice little rug
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a bedside rug, and so far, I like it a lot. It is warm and feels thick to stand on when the floor is cold. It seems to be very well-made. I haven’t had it long enough to launder it, but if it stands up to that, it will be perfect for my needs. Not knowing if it holds up to laundering is the only reason i did not give five stars. I will likely buy more to use as bathroom rugs, once it has been through the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Doris A

customer_reviews.title: Backing is Shedding
customer_reviews.text: After having these for about 3 months and washing them in an HE washer every several weeks, the backing started shedding off in the dryer. The plastic backing comes off in little balls that stick on the front side of the rug that are very hard to remove. Recently, I had to vacuum the rug to try to get rid of them. I was not able to do so. The plastic backing ends up in the dryer lint filter. Therefore, I do not recommend this rug and would never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dun Runnin

customer_reviews.title: So Glad I bought the set!
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time looking at bathroom rugs and checking reviews. These delivered their promises. The quality is excellent, colors vibrant, very soft and.....the scary unknown factor....my vacuum loves them as well! Easy to clean. Gets an A+!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a particular color to complement our decor, as well as an unusual size to fit our bathroom. Some products showed color palettes that were clearly inaccurate, but when this arrived, the color was exactly as shown online, and the rest of the description details were equally accurate. Exactly what we wanted, delivered when we wanted, and all at a very reasonable price. Hard to do better than that!
customer_reviews.author: DoctorB

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE BATH RUGS.
customer_reviews.text: I love these rugs. I bought them after I got their toilet seat cover. I loved the softness and color to them. I was worried about it being not absorption but these do the trick I have 4 of them now. I will purchase more to go in my other bath room I just wish they came in a bigger size. I also wished they came in a deep purple color for my third bathroom but otherwise these are great. They stay in the wash no fuzzes and I air dry them.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Gaskill

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Medium Dark Blue Color~ Machine Wash & Dryable~ Thick & Plush!!!
customer_reviews.text: The matching toilet seat cover fits an elongated toilet seat perfectly!!! Perfect hue of blue! Need to make a large & WIDE rug, not just as a 'runner,' please!!! This company has their own shade of blue, thickness of strands, & it will not mix & match with other company's rugs. This is gorgeous, thick, plush, doesn't leave 'footprints', move around or curl up at the edges. It's fab.
customer_reviews.author: California Girl

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Comfortable - Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous. Soft, cushy, and looks great on my cork floor. Wish I would have gotten this one first, for now I know the previous one purchased for the bathroom will be replaced with one of these. P.S. Both my cats love it to lay on too - just be careful if they are all black for you won't even see them ; )
customer_reviews.author: A. T.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely product, BUT...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three rugs in the same color: beige. Two of the rugs are a peachy beige and the other is just the right color. Since I have them in the same room, it looks awful to me. I’m giving 1 star for being inconvenienced. Lovely product, but, now I’m going to have to either return the two products that are a different color or make a new purchase entirely. If I make a new purchase, are they going to mess up my order again? I looked at my order details and I did indeed order all the same color. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Brootahly Ohness

customer_reviews.title: Works well! Cozy! Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! We have had a lot of rain and my backyard has some issues with flooding and the dogs have been getting Muddy Paws. It does help a lot for absorbing the initial mud and water from their paws when they walk in. It also feels really nice on your feet. The dogs love to lay on it too. It also looks good in the room. Quality is nice. I just ordered a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Ball

customer_reviews.title: A great doormat for dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs that go outside 500 times a day and each time they come in, they bring the outside with them. I bought the biggest size mat to put by my doorwall in hope that the mat would absorb at least some of the mud, rain, and snow. This rug is amazing! It is super absorbent (and soft) and has exceeded my expectations. I haven't washed it yet because there hasn't been a need, I just take it outside and give it a good shake and that's all it has needed thus far.
customer_reviews.author: 2 Aussies

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant color rugs
customer_reviews.text: I love these bathroom mats. The best I have ever, EVER bought. I bought the plum colored ones and they are so vibrant in color. They are much thicker than any other mats I have ever seen any where. You will not be disappointed. I know they are just mats but I was so surprised when I received them. They wash well. I do use my washer and dryer on them. The pile is so thick. You will be pleasantly surprised with these mats.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Cooks

customer_reviews.title: Lush, practical, stylish rug
customer_reviews.text: We have been enjoying this plush bathroom rug for several months now. The generous size and plump fibers mean our feet never touch a cold bath floor. Have recently washed the rug and air dried it - easy! The color and fiber texture would fit with any modern or transitional bath decor. Recommend (I'll likely by another for a second bath.)
customer_reviews.author: Non-fiction Addiction

customer_reviews.title: Colors aren’t accurate
customer_reviews.text: I really really like these bath mats. My complaint is that the color is definitely not sage green. It’s olive green and doesn’t match my bathroom decor. I’m keeping them because I really do like everything about the mat aside from the color - and there is no other color available that will match any better. They’re very soft to step out of the shower onto and absorb water really well.
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Supper soft, quality material
customer_reviews.text: So far, I'm loving these rugs. I bought two for my sunroom. I needed a non slip back or else my dogs slip around on rugs. They're great, but I haven't washed them yet. They seem to be something that will hold up well in a wash. I love how soft they are, so I'm thinking about getting some more for other parts of my house, especially just out of the shower!! They are a little spendy, but I think you get what you pay for and so far these were worth the money. Two adults and three dogs have been walking on them for a week and you can't even tell. They haven't showed any dirt or traffic!
customer_reviews.author: Tia Braseth

customer_reviews.title: Really premium quality.
customer_reviews.text: A truly premium product. I was looking anxious to replace a similar colored mat that didn't fit the space and slipped around because it did not have a rubber backing. This met both my and my wife's expectations. It matched the decor and fit the space perfectly. I am not easy to impress but this mat is luxurious feeling on your feet and doesn't slide around. I could not be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D. Redfield

customer_reviews.title: My dogs LOVE these mats!!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE these mats and so do I! They are great at the door for sopping up wet and muddy feet but they also provide comfy spots for a nap. When my dog and I have to stay at my son’s house, one of these mats makes an extremely portable dog bed to take along. They are easy to clean, just shake them out and toss in the washing machine then dryer. I own 3 of them!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Really helps to keep the floor clean!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this rug. It has helped tremendously with muddy dog paws! We have 2 German shepherds and a muddy mess of a back yard due to construction. We had a regular rug and it did nothing to help clean their paws off. It’s so soft, shake it out or throw it in the washing machine. It’s amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Stax

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up over time
customer_reviews.text: I loved this rug. I also have the toilet rug. It was great at first, and the top is still great, but the under part is padded with a foam-like material, and it is degrading and comes apart in the washer, making a big mess.
customer_reviews.author: C. Madden

customer_reviews.title: Perfet color
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace the bath rugs in my master because the rubber backing had disintegrated. I kept putting it off because it was so hard to find a nice deep wine colored burgundy. These rugs are the perfect color and soft and comfy to walk on. Only downside is the pile is too tall for my shower door to open out over, but the door goes both directions so they work.
customer_reviews.author: P E

customer_reviews.title: Love that it’s machine washable!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today. Nicely padded and non skid. Having dogs I give up on any rugs that aren’t machine washable. I’ll wash on delicate and hang dry. I have the Lifewit bath runner and love it but not as soft and no color but grey. But I do love that they are about 77” long. This one is shorter. Will have to order 2 for hallway.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Lasted for about 6 months,.now it falls apart with each wash
customer_reviews.text: I went to buy a new one of these rugs. I bought the first one in October 2018. It is now May 2019 and the rug has been washed about once a month for 6 times and the rug is completely deteriorated. In the last two washes, the washer and dryer were filled with rug backing fibers. The rug is useable but not in great condition. So, I am now purchasing a new one. Please know it has a "lifetime guarantee" there is no way this rug will last 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Best rug for dirty dogs
customer_reviews.text: Use this rug in the entryway to the back door, as when it rains the large dogs we have tend to get very muddy. I've found this rug helps capture some of the mud off of their paws when they come inside and helps to keep my floors significantly cleaner. Personally I think the color of the dark gray has too much of a blue tone in it, but I like it better than the other colors. I had to buy a second one, as the first had damage from a small grease fire. Make sure not to wash on hot or warm, as the rug will warp.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Brunk

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of the large size, to create a runner from the back door to the living room. The dogs come in with wet feet, by the time they hit the living room rug their paws are dry! They all like to lay on them too. They are easy to clean and they look great, too! I'll be buying more for the kitchen and bath rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi G. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Do not machine dry this rug!
customer_reviews.text: So far very impressed. It's crazy absorbent. I stepped out of the shower to the other day to grab something from the cabinet... was totally soaking wet. By the time I finished my shower and stepped out it was bone dry. Also it's pretty soft and cushy. We'll see how it holds up when washed. ***Update 9/2020*** It got ruined in the dryer. I have pics so you can see what it look like after. I had to purchase another to replace it. Bummer. Make sure you let it drip dry on it's own.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Novitch

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent, Soft, Fluffy hold up well
customer_reviews.text: Loves these rugs, So Soft and absorbent . Love the color. Its worth mentioning that these are more of a seafoam color ( Lighter ). The larger Rug I ordered form another store is Darker ans marked as Turquoise . I'm not an interior decorator but The darker doesn't bother me..I also use these in my RV, these guys are sand vacuums....I have washed mine following the instructions and I have had issues.
customer_reviews.author: Cop105

customer_reviews.title: MORE THAN EXPECTED!!
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful so very high quality. I am so pleased and happy with my turquoise bath mat. It is more than l dreamed. So plush under my feet and the soft hairs are designed to stay up so you don't get that matted look after awhile. So colourful and beautiful. Should last a few years. Great purchase and value. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki S.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love that they are so thick. I bought two but I could only use one in my bathroom because they door couldn't go over the other one. Not really a problem and I found use for the other rug elsewhere. They only thing I am finding is that I because I have pets their fur and other stuff gets stuck in them. I just shake them out every once in a while and they are fine. I've also machine washed/drier them and they were perfectly intact afterwards. I would recommend for people who don't track too much dirt into their house (a no-shoes household).
customer_reviews.author: gklady

customer_reviews.title: Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I am not fan of microfiber, I do not care for feel of it. But I decided to take a chance on these, after all, I could return them if I wanted to. I was very pleasantly surprised that they feel very nice and are very soft. The backing does an excellent job of keeping the rugs in place, no sliding around. I liked these so much, I purchased more for my other bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lackey

customer_reviews.title: Buy it—& love it ——
customer_reviews.text: This mat is huge and so soft! I often find my kids laying on it to read and color. It’s cushy and thick. Honestly, I’ve never liked a bath mat as much as this one. It’s one of the best purchases I’ve made recently. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Berkley Whigham

customer_reviews.title: Great Bathroom Rug
customer_reviews.text: This rug is perfect for our needs. It has a great non-slip backing and is very soft, plush, and absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Novotny

customer_reviews.title: Absorbency is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I'd be writing a review for a bathmat... I guess I'm just getting to be that age where home and kitchen items bring joy. lol. This bathmat is thick and absorbent and really great quality--especially considering the price! I never have to worry about leaving wet footprints and slipping on them later. I would definitely buy another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Ruch

customer_reviews.title: This is great as a dog rug
customer_reviews.text: This is great as a dog rug, but I actually bought it to use when I slide my kayak onto my VW Beetle. The rug protects the back window and trunk from scratching and it doesn't slip off like a towel on a windy day. I also have one for my dog when he comes in from our deck, and it's absolutely great. Washes up easily too.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Ruined My Floor
customer_reviews.text: I got this rug and at first I loved how soft, beautiful, and nonslip it was. Today I tried pulling it up to clean my floors and it stuck like glue. I pulled harder, slowly PEELING it off my concrete floor—and lo and behold, I have this LOVELY mess to spend all day scraping off (see picture). It’s a great rug, but the mess it left behind is kind of a deal breaker...please fix this issue
customer_reviews.author: Stein

customer_reviews.title: After one year
customer_reviews.text: I have had two of these rugs for one year. Neither has been washed often -- they are not in a well-trafficked area and are fine just with a good shaking outside. But yesterday, I washed both rugs according to the directions and pulled both of them damp from the dryer and allowed to air dry the rest of the way. One turned out just fine and the other seems to have weirdly lost its shape. Now there are big ridges where it seems the top of the rug doesn't match the bottom skid free part of the rug. I've loved these rugs but am bummed that I may need to replace one already.
customer_reviews.author: BookAddict

customer_reviews.title: Color in picture is off
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the quality of these rugs, except that the actual color is slightly off from the picture. I actually bought 3 of them and will keep them. They are of good quality, soft and absorbent. The color in the picture is just more vivid than the rugs actually are. They are definitely a sage green, but more pale than they look in the photo. Just something to be aware of.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Seems like just as described in product description
customer_reviews.text: I needed affordable large bath mats in black. I bought 3. They were delivered pronto. They look, feel and smell exactly as I expected. They seem very non-slip. I will update if I feel they fall below 5 stars after some wear. But what do I expect at such an affordable price? They will really have to fail if I lower the rating later.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and feel
customer_reviews.text: Great color. bath mat feels great when you step on it and holds water just fine. I just throw it in the washer and dryer and comes out looking and smelling great. Holds up fine, even after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

product_meta.title: MAYSHINE Chenille Bath Mat for Bathroom Rugs 32" x20", Extra Soft and Absorbent Microfiber Shag Rug, Machine Wash Dry- Perfect Plush Carpet Mats for Tub, Shower, and Room- Dark Blue
feature_bullets: KNOW US :) We are a professional manufacturer of bathroom mats. And we know what kinds of good mats are needed by consumers.

MACHINE-WASH :) Simply throw the mat into the washing machine, wash cold with neutral detergent, hang to dry or air dry flat at low temperatures. After 10 times machine wash test, the MAYSHINE bath mat still looks as good as the new one. No worry about it getting the fibers off, it's really easy to handle and care. In addition, we recommend that you use washing machine who's load is more than 6kg and wash it at least once a week ,In this way, you can maintain your rug.

TECHNIQUE :) UNIQUE fiber-locking technique, say goodbye to horrible fiber-dropping! The chenille mat is composed of 3 layers: fabric layer, middle sponge layer and bottom anti-skid layer. It is designed to absorb water to dry your feet quickly, its strong water-absorbent ability can make your bathroom floors quickly dry and clean. This soft bath rug is for the outside of shower and the outside of tub.

COMFORT :) The fibers are very dense and not easily turn deflated after use, so it can maintain a new look. Height of the fibers: 2.5 cm; Especially soft and thick microfibers relieve pressure and fatigue on your feet. Every time you step out of the shower or bathtub, you can enjoy superior comfort.

ANTI-SLIP :) Non slip bottom is made of PVC material. The middle layer is 25D6 mm sponge, which is more safe and comfortable for your feet. The non-slip bottom helps keeping the mat firmly in place, that it won't slip or slide. !!!WARNING!!! — Place mat on CLEAN DRY SMOOTH FLOOR only. Water under mat can cause it to slip. Keep bottom of mat dry. Before using mat, test with foot to ensure it doesn't move.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars8,276 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
